verses.verse: In the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, the same <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.

And when they were <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim<s%>, and were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; and there <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> before the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto him out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:
Ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> what I <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and how I <S%H5375>bare<s%> you on <S%H5404>eagles<s%>' <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and brought you unto <S%H935>myself<s%>.

Now <S%H8085>therefore<s%>, if ye will obey my <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H8085>indeed<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, then ye shall be mine own <S%H5459>possession<s%> from among all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>: for all the earth is <S%H776>mine<s%>:

and ye shall be unto me a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>. These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and set before them all these <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> commanded <S%H6680>him<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, All that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>reported<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H935>Lo<s%>, I come unto thee in a <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H539>thee<s%>, and may also believe thee for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them <S%H3117>to-day<s%> and <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%>, and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H8071>garments<s%>,

and be <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H5927>yourselves<s%>, that ye go not up into the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, or <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H7097>border<s%> of <S%H5060>it<s%>: whosoever toucheth the <S%H2022>mount<s%> shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>:

no <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H5619>him<s%>, but he shall surely be <S%H5619>stoned<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> <S%H3384>through<s%>; whether it be <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, he shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>: when the <S%H3104>trumpet<s%> soundeth <S%H4900>long<s%>, they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H8071>garments<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1961>Be<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H5066>come<s%> not near a <S%H802>woman<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, when it was <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that there were <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>, and a <S%H3515>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H2389>loud<s%>; and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>; and they <S%H3320>stood<s%> at the <S%H8482>nether<s%> part of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, the whole of <S%H6225>it<s%>, smoked, <S%H6440>because<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> upon it in <S%H784>fire<s%>; and the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> thereof <S%H5927>ascended<s%> as the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace<s%>, and the whole <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2729>quaked<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>.

And when the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H6963>waxed<s%> <S%H1980>louder<s%> <S%H2390>and<s%> <S%H2390>louder<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him by a <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H413>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Go <S%H3381>down<s%>, <S%H5749>charge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, lest they break <S%H2040>through<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H7200>gaze<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%> of them <S%H5307>perish<s%>.
And let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5066>also<s%>, that come near to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3068>themselves<s%>, lest Jehovah break forth upon <S%H6555>them<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>: for thou didst <S%H5749>charge<s%> <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, Set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> about the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942>it<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Go, get thee <S%H3381>down<s%>; and thou shalt come <S%H5927>up<s%>, <S%H175>thou<s%>, and Aaron with <S%H3548>thee<s%>: but let not the priests and the <S%H5971>people<s%> break <S%H2040>through<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, lest he break forth upon <S%H6555>them<s%>.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and told <S%H559>them<s%>.
